trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_SEQ_00<tab>One cannot excavate on an empty stomach, as Qhoterl Pasol well knows.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.

TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine splendid ant eggs at Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the splendid ant eggs to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather splendid silkworms at Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the splendid silkworms to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch a splendid robber crab at the Lozatl)) ((Deliver the splendid robber crab to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Digging is whisker-warping work, as I'm sure you will agree. If one is to keep at it day in and day out, one must have good, nourishing meals.

TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>If you're willing, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, might I trouble you to bring some ingredients so that I can prepare a hearty meal for everyone? My Chaqurl, in particular, is still a growing boy, and few things please me more than to see his belly full and round.

TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>For the dish I plan to make, I still require three ant eggs. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to dig them up readily enough.

TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_020<tab>For the dish I plan to make, I still require three silkworms. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to gather them readily enough.
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_030<tab>For the dish I plan to make, I still require a robber crab. If you fish at the Lozatl using fruit worms, I daresay they'll bite readily enough.

TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_100_010<tab>Three ant eggs ought to suffice for the dish I plan to make. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to dig them up readily enough.

TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_100_020<tab>Three silkworms ought to suffice for the dish I plan to make. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to gather them readily enough.
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_100_030<tab>One robber crab ought to suffice for the dish I plan to make. If you fish at the Lozatl using fruit worms as bait, I daresay they'll bite readily enough.
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_050<tab>How fares the procuring effort, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_060<tab>Ah, splendid! I shall stew these eggs with spices and serve them with cornbread.
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_061<tab>A delectable combination, as my Chaqurl will attest. He doesn't leave so much as a single crumb behind!
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_070<tab>Ah, splendid! Plump and fresh as they are, these silkworms are best prepared simply─fried and salted.
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_071<tab>If there's a way to my husband's stomach, I can say with confidence that this dish is it. The shine in his eyes doesn't lie!
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_080<tab>Ah, splendid! I shall boil this crab whole with vegetables and serve it with steamed grains!
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_081<tab>I'm not too proud to admit that this is my personal favorite. Ah, the mere thought of it makes my mouth water... <slurp>
TEXT_BANQIQ104_03809_QHOTERLPASOL_000_090<tab>Without further ado, I shall set about preparing the meal. We are all in for a treat, and it is thanks to you, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
